input.sentences: it was a cold morning at -17 degrees celsius .
we had to close the trails for safety .
the pine trees were white with snow .
we used the tractor to clear the trails .
it was going to take all day to clear the snow away .
output.sentences: Woke up early to a very cold day.
Everything is snow covered, looks good though.
I'm looking out my window and what I see would make great post card pictures.
It's definetly a snow day for all, the trees are beautiful even though dealing with snow is a messy job.
Hikers will have to wait for another day to enjoy the trails.
